::DrillBit::

DrillBit looked outside.
"Land Mine, no! We will protect you!" He yelled out.
He turned, and wispered to KitKat.
"More where that came from." He turned his attension, outside.
He aimed right for Deemos's head, and opened gattaling gun fire.
